alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 11 at 6:21PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT THROUGH 10 AM CDT WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas and northeast Louisiana, including the following counties and parishes, in southeast Arkansas, Ashley and Chicot Counties. In northeast Louisiana, East Carroll, Franklin LA, Madison LA, Morehouse, Richland and West Carroll Parishes. * WHEN...From Midnight CDT tonight through 10 AM CDT Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Recent rain has saturated the ground in some areas, and an overnight round of showers and thunderstorms is possible, with storms capable of producing several inches of rain over a few hours. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll
